text: 24:12 Jeremaia 22:24-30; 24:1-10; 29:1-2Ezɨ Atrivim Jehoiakin garima, Nebukatnesar izegha gɨvazɨ, a uabɨ uan amebam ko, an apengan ingangarir gumaziba ko, an gumazir dapaniba ko atrivimɨn dɨpenimɨn garir gumaziba, a bar me isa Atrivim Nebukatnesar danɨngasa, me bar nguibam ategha azenan ghua, Nebukatnesar batogha a mɨgɨa ghaze, e ua mɨsoghan kogham. Ezɨ Atrivim Nebukatnesar, Atrivim Jehoiakin isa kalabus gatɨ. Bizir kam Nebukatnesar atrivimɨn itir azenir namba 8ɨn aven oto.
